speaker: customer
text: Yes, hello, Good afternoon, by the way, my name is [PERSON_NAME].

speaker: agent
text: All right, that's good to hear.

speaker: agent
text: And by the way, the reason why we are calling you right now is this is just a quick follow up phone call regarding to your extra benefits at no cost to you.

speaker: agent
text: And I believe down here that you are a Medicare holder with the part A and B.

speaker: agent
text: So since you are a Medicare holder, you're very much qualified now to get and receive your extra benefits.

speaker: agent
text: And in order for me to process that here, all I have to do is just to quickly verify your information that's submitted to us here.

speaker: agent
text: All right, so I want to start from your phone number, the best phone number that we could reach you here.

speaker: agent
text: All right, so sir, can I have at least your first and your last name?

speaker: agent
text: All right, stay on the line.

speaker: agent
text: So how do you spell your first name?

speaker: customer
text: I got it, I got it here.

speaker: agent
text: So Mr. [PERSON_NAME], just to ask here, how old are you right now?

speaker: agent
text: But the linear net, your voice sounds so young.

speaker: agent
text: It doesn't sound like yours though.

speaker: customer
text: And you better take that as a compliment, [PERSON_NAME].

speaker: agent
text: All right, so [PERSON_NAME], what is your exact date of birth here?

speaker: customer
text: All right, let me just take note of that here.

speaker: customer
text: Are you still located here at.

speaker: agent
text: All right, so are you still located in [LOCATION] [LOCATION]?

speaker: agent
text: Okay, and what is your zip code?

speaker: customer
text: Okay, so I get it here.

speaker: agent
text: So [PERSON_NAME], just to ask here, whenever you visit your [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] or hospital, do you pay some money out of your pocket as a copay sometimes?

speaker: agent
text: So [PERSON_NAME], how about your dental vision and hearing?

speaker: customer
text: Do you still have to pay for it whenever you need it?

speaker: agent
text: Alright, so [PERSON_NAME], that is the exact reason why we are calling you right now to help you out with your dental vision and hearing and also for your medicines so that next time when you need it, you don't have to pay for it and your insurance will cover it.

speaker: customer
text: Okay, so, [PERSON_NAME], what will gonna happen here?

speaker: agent
text: Now, in order for you to know more about your Medicare benefits, I'm going to transfer you over to the live [OCCUPATION] on the other line from your own zip code.

speaker: agent
text: They're just going to verify all of your information and at the same time, they're going to explain to you how and when you get your extra benefits.

speaker: agent
text: So, [PERSON_NAME], this will not take too much of your time.

speaker: agent
text: This is just [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] of your time.

speaker: customer
text: Then after that, you're good to go.

speaker: agent
text: So, [PERSON_NAME], just let them know that you are interested in getting your extra benefits.

speaker: agent
text: I'm going to connect you now.

speaker: agent
text: Hello, this is [PERSON_NAME] from the [ORGANIZATION] [ORGANIZATION] [ORGANIZATION] following up on your recent inquiry and how you can save on your Medicare.

speaker: agent
text: So there have been recent changes with plans and rates in your area, and during this open enrollment, you may be able to get lower rates or additional coverage.

speaker: agent
text: You can save up to [MONEY_AMOUNT] to $[MONEY_AMOUNT] on your plan.

speaker: customer
text: Okay, so I'm not able to hear you clearly due to the background noise.

speaker: agent
text: Would you like us to give you a call back or would you like to move away from me?

speaker: agent
text: Thank you for your time and your patience, and you have yourself wonderful day.
